How do I open a homechoice account?

It’s quick and easy! All you have to do is register and we’ll do the rest so you can start shopping for the things you love.

Did you know that having a homechoice account means you qualify for death, disability and retrenchment benefits? Well, now you do.

Register by clicking on ‘Login / Register’ and follow the steps provided OR contact our call centre on 0861 466 3240861 466 324 (South Africa) or +27 21 680 1300+27 21 680 1300 (outside South Africa) to speak to a friendly agent.

You’ll need the following:
  • Your ID number;
  • Address and contact details;
  • Employment details;
  • Monthly income and expenses.

Once you’ve registered, we will do a quick credit check to see if you qualify for a homechoice credit facility account. Credit regulations require you to confirm your income and expenses by sending us 1 month’s recent salary slips, bank statement or a completed proof of income form.

For step-by-step guidance, please click here.

What benefits do I qualify for as a homechoice customer?

As a homechoice account holder, you can look forward to:
  • Shopping with us quickly and easily using your cellphone or computer
  • Paying for products on easy, flexible and affordable terms
  • Enjoying special offers, bundle deals and monthly promotions
  • Automatic entry into our grand prize draw to WIN R1 million every time you purchase (throughout the year)
  • 14-day worry-free returns

How do I register a KwikServe account when I dial *134*466324#?

You must be an existing South African homechoice account holder to use KwikServe.

  1. Dial *134*466324#*134*466324# from your cellphone.
  2. Enter your date of birth (YYMMDD).
  3. Create a 4-digit PIN (please select a PIN that you will remember and always keep it safe).
  4. Confirm your PIN by selecting option 1.

How do I view my account details?

Has your surname, cellphone number or address changed in the last few months?

Please keep your information up to date so you don’t miss out on new products, exciting offers and more.

You can view your account details in 3 different ways:
  1. Dial *134*466324#*134*466324# from your cellphone. Using KwikServe is fast and available 24/7 (only available to existing South African homechoice account holders).
  2. Call us on 0861 466 3240861 466 324 (South Africa) or +27 21 680 1300+27 21 680 1300 (outside South Africa) to speak to a friendly agent.
  3. Access your account at homechoice.co.za (this option is currently not available from your cellphone).

How much credit do I have available?

You can check your credit limit in any of the following ways:
  1. Sign into your online account at homechoice.co.za. Your available credit limit will appear at the top of the page, next to your name.
  2. Dial Kwikserve on *134*466324#*134*466324# from your cellphone.
    • Enter your 4-digit PIN.
    • Select option 2. Account query.
    • Select option 1. How much can I spend?
      • To find out how to register for Kwikserve, click here. You must be an existing South African homechoice account holder to use this option.
  3. Call us on 0861 466 3240861 466 324 (South Africa) or +27 21 680 1300+27 21 680 1300 (outside South Africa)

Click here to open a homechoice credit facility account.

Can I increase my credit limit?

Yes, if your salary increases or you pay off other credit accounts and have more disposable income, you could qualify for more credit. Just contact our call centre on 0861 466 3240861 466 324 (South Africa) or +27 21 680 1300+27 21 680 1300 (outside South Africa) for a quick credit limit check.

Remember, as a responsible credit provider, we aim to protect you against over-indebtedness and give you the credit you deserve. Therefore, you will need to answer some questions about your income and expenses, and provide us with proof of income.

When will you start billing me?

We will start billing you after your parcel has been dispatched. If you are being billed for a product that you haven't received yet, please contact our call centre on 0861 466 3240861 466 324 (South Africa) or +27 21 680 1300+27 21 680 1300 (outside South Africa) for further assistance.

I made a payment on my account, why is it not reflecting?

Payments may take up to 48 hours to reflect on your account. If your payment is still not reflecting after 48 hours, please email your proof of payment, account number and payment reference number to collections@homechoice.co.za or fax us on 021 680 8268/8161.

Alternatively, you can contact our call centre on 0861 466 3240861 466 324 (South Africa) or +27 21 680 1300+27 21 680 1300 (outside South Africa).

What is my account balance?

You can check your account balance in any of the following ways:
  1. Dial KwikServe on *134*466324#*134*466324# from your cellphone.
    • Select option 2. Account query.
    • Select option 3. Account balance.
      • To find out how to register for Kwikserve, click here. You must be an existing South African homechoice account holder to use this option.
  2. Visit homechoice.co.za and log into your account.
  3. Contact our call centre on 0861 466 3240861 466 324 (South Africa) or +27 21 680 1300+27 21 680 1300 (outside South Africa)
Checking your monthly statement:
If you are not receiving your monthly statements via email or SMS, contact our call centre on 0861 466 3240861 466 324 (South Africa) or +27 21 680 1300+27 21 680 1300 (outside South Africa).

How do I settle my account balance?

To settle your account, please follow these steps:

STEP 1: Request your settlement amount in either of the following ways

IMPORTANT: Your settlement amount is not the same as the balance on your statement.

  1. Dial KwikServe on *134*466324#*134*466324# from your cellphone.
    • Enter your secret 4-digit PIN.
    • Select option 2. Account query.
    • Select option 5. Settlement amount.
    • The amount indicated is your true settlement amount. It is valid until the date indicated.
      • To find out how to register for Kwikserve, click here. You must be an existing South African homechoice account holder to use this option.
  2. Contact our call centre on 0861 466 3240861 466 324 (South Africa) or +27 21 680 1300+27 21 680 1300 (outside South Africa)
STEP 2: Pay your settlement amount:

IMPORTANT: When you request your settlement amount, it is only valid for 7 days from the day you requested the amount. If you do not make the payment within 7 days, the settlement request will expire. This means, you will have to request your settlement amount again before making payment.

You can pay your settlement amount in either of the following ways:
  1. Contact our call centre on 0861 466 3240861 466 324 (South Africa) or +27 21 680 1300+27 21 680 1300 (outside South Africa). A friendly agent will assist you in making a payment using Ozow. It’s a safe and instant payment using a personalised link sent to your phone.
  2. Deposit into our bank account at your bank or pay via EFT using web/cellphone banking. Please use your homechoice account number as your reference for all cash payments. Once you have made your deposit, you will need to send proof of payment.
    • Email it to collections@homechoice.co.za or fax it to +27 21 680 1100.

For ease of payment, we have accounts with a few major banks. Our banking details are:

If you have settled your account but there is still a balance reflecting on your statement, please contact our call centre on 0861 466 3240861 466 324 (South Africa) or +27 21 680 1300+27 21 680 1300 (outside South Africa) for further assistance.

Can I change my password online?

Yes. This is how:
  1. Click on ‘Log in or Register’.
  2. Click on either ‘Log in with your phone number’ or ‘Log in with your email address’.
  3. Click on ‘Forgot Password?’

Your account is a secure environment that is protected by your password. As long as you keep your password safe, no one will be able to log in and view your information.

Tips on how to keep your password safe:
  • Use a password that is easy to remember but difficult to copy by adding symbols, numbers and capital letters.
  • Change your password every 3 months.
  • Never share your password with anyone!

How do I close my homechoice account?

We are sorry you want to close your account with us. To proceed with the closure, please email your request to complaints@homechoice.co.za with ‘account closure’ in the subject line and provide us with your account number. You can also call our customer service line at 0861 999 6350861 999 635 for further queries or to follow up on your request.

How do I request the deletion of my personal information?

In order for us to delete your records with us, please click here to download the account deletion form. Once completed and signed, you can forward it to complaints@homechoice.co.za with ‘delete account’ in the subject line. Please also provide us with your account number. You can also call our customer service line at 0861 999 6350861 999 635 for further queries or to follow up on your request.
